products.short_description: Find your teammates at a blink.
products.full_description:
Blink View Directory is a powerful add-in designed for SharePoint Online and Microsoft Teams, focusing on organizational connectivity and communication.

This app streamlines access to your entire company directory, enabling employees to easily find colleagues through intuitive search features.

Overall, Blink View Directory not only simplifies the process of locating team members but also enriches the collaborative environment within your organization. It’s a valuable tool for enhancing productivity and ensuring everyone is connected.
products.product_message: Enhance effortless connections with Blink View Directory! Find teammates, visualize your org chart, and communicate instantly—elevating collaboration effectively!
products.features_title: Everything is easy when you have the right tools
products.features_description: Blink View Directory is an essential add-in for SharePoint and Microsoft Teams that enhances connectivity and communication across your organization. With intuitive search features, employees can easily find colleagues by location or department, while the organizational chart offers a clear view of team structures. The tool promotes instant communication through Microsoft Teams and provides comprehensive reporting to assist HR functions. By showcasing employee profiles and fostering connections, Blink View Directory enriches collaboration and boosts productivity, ensuring everyone stays connected, no matter where they are.

features.title: Comprehensive Reporting
features.description: Generate insightful reports on employee data and interactions, which can assist in HR functions and resource allocation.

features.title: Instant Communication
features.description: The add-in allows users to initiate Microsoft Teams chats directly from the directory, facilitating quick and seamless communication with colleagues.

features.title: Departmental Filtering
features.description: Seamlessly navigate through team members by selecting their department, enhancing departmental coordination and efficiency.

features.title: Organization Visualization
features.description: Users can view the organizational chart, providing a clear understanding of team structures and reporting lines. This feature helps employees identify key contacts and navigate their company’s hierarchy effectively.
